VIRTUAL_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name to add to the nginx proxy.
VIRTUAL_HOST.label: Virtual Host

LETSENCRYPT_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name for letsencrypt - likely the same as the virtual host.
LETSENCRYPT_HOST.label: Letsencrypt Host

LETSENCRYPT_TEST.description: Specify using letsencrypt test or production certificate generation.
LETSENCRYPT_TEST.label: Letsencrypt test(true/false)

MYSQL_SERVER_HOST.description: The IP address or the name of the host where the server is running.
MYSQL_SERVER_HOST.label: Mysql host

MYSQL_SERVER_DB_NAME.description: The name of a MySQL database to be created on image startup.
MYSQL_SERVER_DB_NAME.label: Mysql database

MYSQL_SERVER_USER.description: The new user name with superuser permissions for the MySQL account.
MYSQL_SERVER_USER.label: Mysql user

MYSQL_SERVER_PASS.description: The password set for the MySQL account.
MYSQL_SERVER_PASS.label: Mysql password

Only Office (NXR).description: This NXR Rockon installs the ONLYOFFICE Community Server.
Only Office (NXR).more_info: ONLYOFFICE Community Server is a free open source collaborative system developed to manage documents, projects, customer relationship and email correspondence, all in one place. This Rockon is designed to work with the NXR reverse proxy and letsencrypt installed.
